overview: Ozkan has a special flower which is from Barcelona. He realize that the flower is ready for smoke. He organizes his friends to party that they play football on console. Friends come together but a crow grabs the flower from the pot and run away. He is so ambitious to make himself high and decide to go for a new one. But on the road to Edirne, this 4 guys will create some trouble with Reco, the mafia leader around the region. A thrilling action and comedy starts after they come face to face with him, while he is looking for them also.
title: Hemen Döneriz
